templateSyntax.rule: ALWAYS use Nunjucks syntax, NEVER use Liquid syntax

componentRules: ALWAYS check Component Registry before creating new components
NEVER create inline styles or new CSS without checking existing components
DOCUMENT every new component immediately in the registry
TEST components in isolation before using in pages

sessionStart: AI checks development log for recent changes
beforeCreatingContent: Review Component Registry for existing components
Check if similar components can be reused
Plan component composition for the page

commonIssues.issue: Template render error: expected variable end
commonIssues.cause: Using Liquid syntax (colon) instead of Nunjucks syntax (parentheses)
commonIssues.solution: Change filter syntax from 'filterName: args' to 'filterName(args)'
commonIssues.preventiveMeasure: Always use Nunjucks documentation as reference

commonIssues.solution: Use custom date filter with parentheses: date('%Y-%m-%d')
commonIssues.preventiveMeasure: Use dateReadable filter for display, date() for attributes

commonIssues.cause: Not checking Component Registry before creating new elements
commonIssues.solution: Review and use existing components from registry
commonIssues.preventiveMeasure: Always run 'echo init' and check registry first

practices: Keep components focused on single purpose
Use semantic HTML in all components
Always use .njk extension for Nunjucks templates
Use 'safe' filter for HTML content: {{ content | safe }}
Use front matter for page metadata
Place all blog posts in src/blog/ folder
Include required front matter: title, date, author, excerpt
Tag all posts with 'blog' tag for collections
Test locally with 'npm run build' before pushing
Use 'npm start' for development with hot reload
Check Netlify build logs for deployment errors
Update development log after each session

builtin: safe - Marks content as safe HTML
dump - Outputs variable structure for debugging
length - Get length of array or string
custom: dateReadable - Formats date as 'Month Day, Year'
date(format) - Formats date with custom format string

deploymentChecklist: Run 'npm run build' locally to test
Check all date filters use Nunjucks syntax
Ensure all new components are documented
Ensure all new files are committed
Monitor Netlify dashboard for build status

quickCommands.init: echo init - Initialize AI session with project context

aiNotes: CRITICAL: Run 'echo init' at start of every session
This project uses component-based architecture - check registry first
This project uses Nunjucks, not Liquid - syntax is different
Always test template changes locally first
Date filters require special attention - use custom filters
Blog posts automatically build from markdown files
Netlify builds trigger on push to main branch
Document all changes in development log
